00013 void Translation::search(std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> >& results) const
00014 {
00015     partial_search(m_verses.begin(), m_verses.end(), results[0]);
00016 }
00017 
00018 void Translation::partial_search(std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Verse> >::const_iterator begin, 
00019                                  std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Verse> >::const_iterator end,
00020                                  boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> query) const
00021 {
00022     for (std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Verse> >::const_iterator it = begin;
00023          it != end;
00024          ++it)
00025     {
00026         if ((*it)->match(query))
00027         {
00028             query->add_matching_verse(m_long_name, (*it)->get_unique_id());
00029         }
00030     }
00031 }

00033 std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> > Translation::get_entry(int unique_id, int num_entries_context) const
00034 {
00035     int requested_lower_bound = unique_id - num_entries_context;
00036     int lower_bound =  requested_lower_bound >= 0 ? requested_lower_bound : 0;
00037  
00038     int requested_upper_bound = unique_id + num_entries_context + 1;
00039     int upper_bound = requested_upper_bound <= static_cast<int>(m_verses.size()-1) ? requested_upper_bound : (m_verses.size()-1);
00040 
00041     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> > verses;
00042     std::copy(&m_verses[lower_bound], &m_verses[upper_bound], std::back_inserter(verses));
00043 
00044     return verses;
00045 }

00047 bool Translation::Save(const std::string &filename)
00048 {
00049     BibleStudy::TranslationBuffer buffer;
00050     buffer.set_long_name(m_long_name);
00051     buffer.set_short_name(m_short_name);
00052 
00053     for (std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Verse> >::const_iterator it = m_verses.begin();
00054          it != m_verses.end();
00055          ++it)
00056     {
00057         BibleStudy::VerseBuffer* verse_buffer = buffer.add_verse();
00058         verse_buffer->set_book((*it)->get_book());
00059         verse_buffer->set_chapter((*it)->get_chapter());
00060         verse_buffer->set_verse((*it)->get_verse());
00061         verse_buffer->set_text((*it)->get_text());
00062         verse_buffer->set_unique_id((*it)->get_unqiue_id());
00063     }
00064 
00065     std::fstream output(filename.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::trunc | std::ios::binary);
00066     if (!buffer.SerializeToOstream(&output))
00067         return false;
00068     output.close();
00069 
00070     return true;
00071 }

00073 bool Translation::Resume(const std::string &filename)
00074 {
00075     BibleStudy::TranslationBuffer buffer;
00076 
00077     std::fstream input(filename.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00078     if (!input || !buffer.ParseFromIstream(&input)) 
00079         return false;
00080 
00081     input.close();
00082 
00083     m_long_name = buffer.long_name();
00084     m_short_name = buffer.short_name();
00085 
00086     m_verse_tree = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, 0));
00087     VerseTreeItem* cur_verse_tree_root = m_verse_tree.get();
00088     //m_verse_tree = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem("", -1));
00089 
00090     //boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> translation_item = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, 0));

00092     //VerseTreeItem* cur_verse_tree_root = translation_item.get();
00093 
00094     std::string cur_book;
00095     int cur_chapter = 0;
00096 
00097     int num_verses = buffer.verse_size();

00099     {
00100         BibleStudy::VerseBuffer verse_buffer = buffer.verse(i);
00101         boost::shared_ptr<Verse> verse(new Verse(verse_buffer.book(), verse_buffer.chapter(),
00102                                                  verse_buffer.verse(), verse_buffer.text(),
00103                                                  verse_buffer.unique_id()));
00104         m_verses.push_back(verse);
00105 
00106         if (cur_book == "" || cur_book != verse_buffer.book())
00107         {
00108             cur_book = verse_buffer.book();
00109             cur_chapter = 1;
00110 
00111             if (cur_verse_tree_root->get_parent() != NULL && cur_verse_tree_root->get_parent()->get_parent() != NULL)
00112                 cur_verse_tree_root = cur_verse_tree_root->get_parent()->get_parent();
00113 
00114             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> book = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00115             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(book, VerseTreeItem::book);
00116 
00117             cur_verse_tree_root = book.get();
00118 
00119             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> chapter = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00120             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(chapter, VerseTreeItem::chapter);
00121             
00122             cur_verse_tree_root = chapter.get();
00123 
00124             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00125             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(verse, VerseTreeItem::verse);
00126         }
00127         else if (cur_chapter == 0 || cur_chapter != verse_buffer.chapter())
00128         {
00129             cur_chapter++;
00130 
00131             cur_verse_tree_root = cur_verse_tree_root->get_parent();
00132 
00133             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> chapter = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00134             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(chapter, VerseTreeItem::chapter);
00135             
00136             cur_verse_tree_root = chapter.get();
00137 
00138             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00139             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(verse, VerseTreeItem::verse);
00140 
00141         }
00142         else
00143         {
00144             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00145             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(verse, VerseTreeItem::verse);
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149     return true;

00152 bool Translation::Import(const std::string& long_name, const std::string& short_name, const std::string& filename)
00153 {
00154     this->m_long_name = long_name;
00155     this->m_short_name = short_name;
00156     std::ifstream raw_text;
00157 
00158     raw_text.open(filename.c_str());
00159 
00160     std::string line;
00161     while (getline(raw_text, line))
00162     {
00163         std::vector<std::string> parts;
00164         boost::algorithm::split(parts, line, boost::algorithm::is_any_of("*"));
00165 
00166         boost::shared_ptr<Verse> verse(new Verse(parts[1], boost::lexical_cast<int>(parts[2]),
00167                                                  boost::lexical_cast<int>(parts[3]), parts[4],
00168                                                  boost::lexical_cast<int>(parts[0])));
00169         m_verses.push_back(verse);
00170     }
00171 
00172     return true;
00173 }

00182 std::string verse_collection_to_title_and_string_wrapped(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >& verse_collection, boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation)
00183 {
00184     std::string verse_collection_string = verse_collection_to_string(verse_collection);
00185 
00186     int line_length = 80;
00187 
00188     size_t cur_line_length = line_length;
00189     while (verse_collection_string.length() > cur_line_length)
00190     {
00191         size_t space_pos = verse_collection_string.find_last_of(" ", cur_line_length);
00192         if (space_pos != std::string::npos)
00193             verse_collection_string.replace(space_pos, 1, "\n");
00194 
00195         cur_line_length += line_length;
00196     }
00197 
00198     return verse_collection_title(verse_collection, translation) + "\n\n" + verse_collection_string;
00199 }
00200 
00201 std::string verse_collection_to_string(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >& verse_collection)
00202 {
00203     std::string verse_string;
00204 
00205     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator it = verse_collection.begin();
00206     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator end = verse_collection.end();
00207     for (; it != end; ++it)
00208     {
00209         verse_string += (*it)->get_text();
00210         if (std::distance(it, end) != 1)
00211             verse_string += " ";
00212     }
00213 
00214     return verse_string;
00215 }
00216 
00217 std::string verse_collection_title(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >& verse_collection, boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation)
00218 {
00219     std::string title;
00220 
00221     std::string cur_book;
00222     int cur_chapter = 0;
00223     int cur_verse = 0;
00224     int last_verse = 0;
00225 
00226     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator it = verse_collection.begin();
00227     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator end = verse_collection.end();
00228     for (; it != end; ++it)
00229     {
00230         if (cur_book.size() == 0)
00231         {
00232             title += (*it)->get_book() + " ";
00233             cur_book = (*it)->get_book();
00234             cur_chapter = 0;
00235         }
00236         else if (cur_book != (*it)->get_book())
00237         {
00238             title += ";";
00239             title += (*it)->get_book() + " ";
00240             cur_book = (*it)->get_book();
00241             cur_chapter = 0;
00242         }
00243         
00244         if (cur_chapter == 0)
00245         {
00246             title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>((*it)->get_chapter()) + ":";
00247             cur_chapter = (*it)->get_chapter();
00248             cur_verse = 0;
00249         }
00250         else if (cur_chapter != (*it)->get_chapter())
00251         {
00252             if (cur_verse != last_verse)
00253             {
00254                 title += "-";
00255                 title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(cur_verse);
00256                 last_verse = cur_verse;
00257             }
00258 
00259             title += ",";
00260             title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>((*it)->get_chapter()) + ":";
00261             cur_chapter = (*it)->get_chapter();
00262             cur_verse = 0;
00263         }
00264 
00265         if (cur_verse == 0)
00266         {
00267             title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>((*it)->get_verse());
00268             cur_verse = (*it)->get_verse();
00269             last_verse = cur_verse;
00270         }
00271         else if (cur_verse != (*it)->get_verse())
00272         {
00273             cur_verse = (*it)->get_verse();
00274         }
00275     }
00276 
00277     if (cur_verse != 0 && it != verse_collection.begin())
00278     {
00279         if (cur_verse != last_verse)
00280         {
00281             title += "-";
00282             title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>((*--it)->get_verse());
00283         }
00284     }
00285 
00286     title += " (";
00287     title += translation->get_short_name();
00288     title += ")";
00289 
00290     return title;
00291 }
